articles.author: Rachel Brodsky
articles.title: Loving you (again): Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck’s reunion is nostalgia eating itself - The Independent
articles.description: A resurrected Bennifer would remind us of a time when the American dream still felt possible, writes Rachel Brodsky – and rewrite the mockery the couple experienced 17 years ago
articles.content: Nostalgia is a powerful thing. Its the catalyst behind any number of television reboots, movie sequels, and oral history articles. Its the perennial rose-coloured lens society loves to look through w… [+5430 chars]

articles.title: How 'Bling Empire's Kevin Kreider paid off $26000 in debt - CNBC
articles.description: Kevin Kreider is currently filming the second season of his Netflix hit "Bling Empire," the reality show that follows a group of ultra-wealthy Asian Americans in LA. But the rising public figure has worn a lot of different hats in his career, starting off as …
